title: Clamp a temperature reading to [-40, 85]
story: A temperature sensor may temporarily report values outside the safe operating range. Clamp the reading so downstream logic never sees out-of-range temperatures.
post: clamped_temp >= -40 and clamped_temp <= 85 and ((sensor_temp < -40 and clamped_temp == -40) or (sensor_temp > 85 and clamped_temp == 85) or (sensor_temp >= -40 and sensor_temp <= 85 and clamped_temp == sensor_temp))
